name: Candy World!
description:
This game is designed for Apple Watch and iPhone. 

This is a fun puzzle for those who love sweets!

It is a simple and fun way to pass time. The goal is to arrange various sweets by their types. Try to get as many rows of the same type as you can.

Challenge yourself to see how many rows you can get!

*Get bonus playtime by making as few swaps as possible
